description.en:
Bitfresh is a secure and transparent blockchain-based iGaming platform with a community first focus and a unique retro-style design. With Bitfresh you can enjoy non-custodial betting, mining, dividends sharing, and new and innovative features like rankings and player items.

$BFT is a BEP20-based utility token used for profit sharing and stakeholding. You can use it as an in-game currency for betting, and also to stake it and gain platform profits (dividends).
